attributes.action: Stop fat people wearing skinny jeans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Me and many of my aquaintences wish the Honourable Prime Minister to place a ban on overweight people wearing skinny jeans, it is a public indecency that many people do not wish to see. We find that this type of clothing highly obtrusive and we ask that the Honourable Prime Minister do something about it; Not only does it look atrocious, but many health problems could possibly occur, such as DVT and stunted leg growth or bone problems, particularly in younger children or adults.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
